summary: Fitness tracking app inspired by Hevy with workout tracking, rest timers, BMI calculator, bodyweight tracker, meal tracking, three training phases (beginner/intermediate/advanced), and Instagram-style workout content gallery
architectural_notes: Fitness app inspired by Hevy workout tracker
User selects training level at onboarding, app customizes workout programs accordingly
Placeholder content for influencer workouts (Ankit Saket, Vidyut Jamwal, Tiger Shroff) to be replaced with actual media later
known_issues: Multiple build attempts failed due to request complexity - may need incremental feature implementation

existing_features.title: Remove any incomplete or broken features from previous build attempts that are causing deployment failures
Verify Internet Identity authentication is working properly and all protected routes require login

new_feature_requests.summary: Workout tracking with rest timers between sets
Three training phases (beginner, intermediate, advanced) with user selection
Instagram-style workout video/reels gallery with placeholder influencer content
Ensure the workout logger, exercise library, and workout history features are working correctly and accessible to authenticated users
